Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I relate to the wonderful brain freak out and the plans for drastic compensatory action. Sorry to hear you’re dealing with that mental/emotional tsunami. I know logic is often ineffective against it so mostly I want to say that I really hope you’ll be able to stay safe <3 (My misuse (abuse) of OTC sleep medicine took me to some dark and dangerous times that I wouldn’t wish on anybody.)
